entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Menger Lab website!

entry.title: Chuang Dong joins the Menger Lab!

link.title: Chuang Dong joins the Menger Lab!

entry.content:
We are thrilled to welcome Chuang Dong as a Senior Bioinformatics Scientist in the Menger Lab at Gustave Roussy Institute (IGR) 🎉. Chuang joins us after six years of outstanding work under the mentorship of Dr. Milpied at Marseille-Lumniy Immunology Center (CIML).

Welcome, Chuang! 👏
entry.summary: We are thrilled to welcome Chuang Dong as a Senior Bioinformatics Scientist in the Menger Lab at Gustave Roussy Institute (IGR) 🎉. Chuang joins us after six years of outstanding work under the mentorship of Dr. Milpied at Marseille-Lumniy Immunology Center (CIML).
